summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1598, for the improvement of Railroad Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from Main Street to King Street, by constructing a sewer therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all wyes, manholes, flush tanks, openings and other necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 17017 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
